import React from 'react'; import { FaFilter, FaTint, FaWind, FaAtom } from 'react-icons/fa'; const SeparatorPage = () => { const separationTypes = [ { icon: , title: "Gravity Separation", description: "Utilizing density differences for efficient solid-liquid and liquid-liquid separation." }, { icon: , title: "Centrifugal Separation", description: "High-speed rotation for enhanced separation of immiscible phases and fine particles." }, { icon: , title: "Cyclone Separation", description: "Aerodynamic separation of particles from gas streams using centrifugal forces." } ]; return (
{/* Page Header */}

Separation Equipment Design & Engineering

Advanced separator design and optimization for New Zealand's process industries, providing efficient separation solutions that maximize product recovery and minimize waste while maintaining operational excellence.

{/* Separator Overview */}

Precision Separation Technology

Separators are fundamental units in chemical and physical processing, enabling the division of mixtures into their component parts. Our separator designs optimize separation efficiency while minimizing energy consumption and operational costs.

From simple gravity settlers to advanced centrifugal devices, we provide comprehensive separation solutions tailored to New Zealand's diverse industrial applications and environmental requirements.

Design Optimization

  • • Particle size and density analysis
  • • Fluid dynamics modeling
  • • Separation efficiency optimization
  • • Equipment sizing and selection
  • • Process integration studies
  • • Environmental impact assessment
{/* Separation Types */}

Separation Technologies

Comprehensive separation solutions for diverse industrial applications

{separationTypes.map((type, index) => (
{type.icon}

{type.title}

{type.description}

))}
{/* Applications */}

Industrial Applications

Process Industries

Critical separation for chemical, pharmaceutical, and petrochemical operations.

  • • Oil-water separation
  • • Solids clarification
  • • Particle classification
  • • Product purification

Environmental & Mining

Specialized separation for environmental cleanup and mineral processing applications.

  • • Wastewater treatment
  • • Sludge dewatering
  • • Ore beneficiation
  • • Tailings management
{/* Efficiency Notice */}

Separation Efficiency

Our separator designs maximize separation efficiency through advanced fluid dynamics modeling, optimized residence times, and innovative internals design for superior performance.

); }; export default SeparatorPage;
